thread.title: YWCA to host forum on race relations
thread.title_full: YWCA to host forum on race relations - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: YWCA to host forum on race relations
text: A police officer and a former FBI agent will help headline a panel discussion next month about police and race relations in Charlotte. Charlotte-Mecklenburg Police Maj. Bruce Bellamy will join former FBI agent Quentin Williams and journalist Glenn Burkins at the Nov. 12 forum at the YWCA, 3420 Park Road. The event is called " Charting the Way Forward: Police and Race Relations in a 21st Century Charlotte. " To register for the free forum, go to http://bit.ly/1NkB8Lr or YWCAcentralcarolinas.org. Jim Morrill
